Like many sites, we use "cookies" to collect information.
We may need to request information from you to confirm your identity.
While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you.
Clicking on these links may allow those third parties to collect data about you.
We retain different types of data for different lengths depending on the type of data and what it is used for.
Like many site operators, we collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service ("Log Data").
